entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
